REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0783 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-REC 04-03 0047

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET RECEIVES 205 MLN STG LATE HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it has provided around 205 mln stg late assistance to the market, bringing the total help today to 722 mln which compares with the Bank's revised deficit forecast of 800 mln stg. REUTER
